definition: A traditional narrative, often involving magical or supernatural elements, typically passed down through generations orally or in written form. Märchen are commonly used to entertain and educate children, often featuring moral lessons or fantastical characters and settings.

examples.english: I have read many fairy tales.

examples.german: Meine Oma erzählt mir immer Märchen.
examples.english: My grandma always tells me fairy tales.
Do you have a favorite fairy tale?

examples.german: Märchen sind voller Magie und Abenteuer.
examples.english: Fairy tales are full of magic and adventure.
